data.title: Seamagazine
data.text:
Ox-Bo Marine: Your Ultimate Destination for Fun and Adventure in Horicon, Wisconsin

Welcome to Ox-Bo Marine!

Welcome to Ox-Bo Marine, the premier marina in Horicon, Wisconsin! If you're looking for a place to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and immerse yourself in the beauty of nature, you've come to the right place. Situated on the picturesque shores of Horicon Marsh, Ox-Bo Marine offers a wide range of activities and amenities for boating enthusiasts, nature lovers, and adventure seekers alike.

At Ox-Bo Marine, we believe that life is better on the water. Whether you're a seasoned boater or a first-time visitor, our friendly and knowledgeable staff is here to ensure that you have an unforgettable experience. From boat rentals and fishing charters to scenic cruises and wildlife tours, there's something for everyone at Ox-Bo Marine.

Endless Boating Opportunities

With over 32,000 acres of water to explore, Horicon Marsh is a boater's paradise, and Ox-Bo Marine is your gateway to adventure. Whether you prefer sailing, kayaking, or jet skiing, we have a wide selection of well-maintained watercraft available for rent. Our fleet includes everything from pontoons and fishing boats to speedboats and canoes, ensuring that you'll find the perfect vessel for your aquatic escapades.

As you navigate the crystal-clear waters of Horicon Marsh, you'll be surrounded by breathtaking natural beauty. Keep an eye out for the diverse wildlife that calls this area home, including herons, egrets, turtles, and even the occasional bald eagle. With every turn, you'll discover new wonders and create lasting memories.

Fishing Adventures for Anglers of All Levels

If you're an avid angler or simply enjoy casting a line from time to time, Ox-Bo Marine is the place to be. Horicon Marsh is renowned for its excellent fishing opportunities, and our experienced guides will take you to the best spots to reel in a trophy catch. Whether you're targeting bass, walleye, pike, or panfish, you'll find plenty of action on the water.

Don't worry if you're new to fishing â€“ our friendly staff will be more than happy to provide you with tips and tricks to improve your skills. We also offer fishing charters for those who prefer to sit back, relax, and let our experts handle all the logistics. So grab your fishing gear and get ready for an unforgettable angling experience at Ox-Bo Marine!

Explore the Beauty of Horicon Marsh

Horicon Marsh is not only a haven for boating and fishing enthusiasts but also a paradise for nature lovers. With its diverse ecosystem and abundant wildlife, this wetland gem offers endless opportunities for exploration and discovery. At Ox-Bo Marine, we offer guided wildlife tours and scenic cruises that allow you to get up close and personal with the marsh's inhabitants.

As you glide through the tranquil waters, you'll have the chance to spot rare bird species, observe nesting sites, and learn about the unique flora and fauna that make Horicon Marsh so special. Our knowledgeable guides will share fascinating insights and stories, ensuring that you leave with a deeper appreciation for this natural wonderland.

Unwind and Relax at Ox-Bo Marine

After a day filled with adventure, there's no better place to unwind and relax than Ox-Bo Marine. Our marina offers a range of amenities to make your visit as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. Kick back and soak up the sun on our spacious sundeck, or take a refreshing dip in the crystal-clear waters of Horicon Marsh.

If you're feeling hungry, head over to our on-site restaurant, where you can indulge in delicious meals made from locally sourced ingredients. From fresh seafood to mouthwatering burgers, our menu has something to satisfy every craving. Pair your meal with a cold beverage from our fully stocked bar, and toast to a day well spent.

Host Your Next Event at Ox-Bo Marine

Looking for a unique venue to host your next special event? Look no further than Ox-Bo Marine. Whether you're planning a birthday party, corporate retreat, or wedding celebration, our marina provides the perfect backdrop for any occasion. With our spacious event spaces, stunning waterfront views, and top-notch catering services, your event is sure to be a memorable one.

Our dedicated event planning team will work closely with you to ensure that every detail is taken care of, from decorations and entertainment to customized menus and accommodations. Let us turn your vision into reality and create an unforgettable experience for you and your guests.

Stay and Play in Horicon, Wisconsin

While Ox-Bo Marine is undoubtedly the highlight of any visit to Horicon, Wisconsin, there's plenty more to see and do in this charming town. Explore the Horicon Marsh Education and Visitor Center, where you can learn about the marsh's history, ecology, and conservation efforts. Take a leisurely stroll through the downtown area, filled with quaint shops, art galleries, and cozy cafes.

If you're a nature enthusiast, be sure to check out the Horicon National Wildlife Refuge, home to a wide variety of migratory birds and other wildlife. Hike the trails, go birdwatching, or simply immerse yourself in the tranquility of this natural oasis. With its small-town charm and natural beauty, Horicon is the perfect destination for a weekend getaway or a longer vacation.

Plan Your Visit to Ox-Bo Marine Today!

Ready to embark on an unforgettable adventure at Ox-Bo Marine? Plan your visit today and experience the beauty of Horicon Marsh like never before. Whether you're seeking thrilling water sports, peaceful fishing spots, or a chance to connect with nature, Ox-Bo Marine has it all.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to create lasting memories with your friends and family. Book your boat rental, fishing charter, or wildlife tour now and get ready for an incredible journey through the heart of Wisconsin's natural wonders. We can't wait to welcome you to Ox-Bo Marine!

Contact Us

For more information about Ox-Bo Marine or to make a reservation, please contact us at:

Phone: 555-123-4567

Email: [email protected]

Address: 123 Lakeside Drive, Horicon, WI 53032
